text: You and Me () is a 1971 Soviet movie directed by Larisa Shepitko.Отреставрированный фильм "Огненная дуга" покажут в кино 23 февраляТЫ И Я (1971) == Actors == * Leonid Dyachkov as Pyotr * Yuri Vizbor as Sasha * Alla Demidova as Katya * Natalya Bondarchuk as Nadya (as N. Bondarchuk) * Leonid Markov as Sergey (as L. Markov) * Vladimir Nosik as Kolka (as V. Nosik) == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1971 movies
title: You and Me (1971 movie)
